entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 09:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: WNW 39 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Drizzle and rain showers changing to a few flurries this morning and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 90 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
